EasyDesktop 2.5 introduces powerful productivity improvements, better visual feedback, and enhanced project-wide tools while maintaining stability and ease of use.

### âœ¨ Whatâ€™s New in This Release
* Global code is now included in the FLOW generator, ensuring consistent behavior across generated flows.
* Fireworks animation on successful compilation for clear visual feedback.
* Shake animation feedback when:
  * Trying to move a locked object from the Master Page.
  * Assigning an ID name that already exists.
* New Global Project Search:
  * A floating panel (similar to Ctrl+F in VS Code) that searches across the entire project.
  * Search includes:
    * Widget names (IDs)
    * Visible text (Labels, Buttons, etc.)
    * Internal Python code (User Scripts)
* Fixed missing code in the Global Subroutines demo.
* Added missing dialog actions:
  * Critical and Warning message actions are now available in File & Dialog actions.
* Alignment guidelines added:
  * Visual guides appear when dragging objects across the horizontal or vertical center.
